text: Gabriel Fairman is the Founder and Chief Executive Officer of Bureau Works, a Silicon Valley technology company that uses artificial intelligence for translation services for large corporations. Gabriel was born in Brazil and graduated from Swarthmore College in the United States. After college, he spent several months at Fo-Guang-Shang, a Buddhist monastery where he learned the Buddhist principles he used to start Bureau Works. He routinely speaks and contributes as an expert in the field of artificial intelligence.
